Question: This person and Jessica Biel are minority owners of the Memphis Grizzlies.
Hints: In early 1999, this person began dating fellow former The New Mickey Mouse Club cast member and recording artist Britney Spears.
This person and Biel separated in March 2011; he later proposed to her in the mountains of Jackson, Wyoming in December.
Band member Lance Bass was openly critical of this person's actions in his memoir Out of Sync.
